title.rendered: Kasa Unveils New Property in Downtown Asheville, Blending Historic Charm with Modern Hospitality

content.rendered:
ASHEVILLE, N.C., Feb. 15, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Kasa Living, Inc., a pioneer in reimagined hospitality, is excited to announce the opening of its newest property, Kasa Downtown Asheville. Located in the heart of Asheville’s vibrant downtown, this latest venture blends the city’s historic charm and Kasa’s innovative vision of livable space.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/kasa-unveils-new-property-in-downtown-asheville-blending-historic-charm-with-modern-hospitality-302062702.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
